Plot: Jack Ryan, as a young covert CIA analyst, uncovers a Russian plot to crash the U.S. economy with a terrorist attack.
Title: Jack Ryan: Shadow Recruit
Writer: Adam Cozad, David Koepp, Tom Clancy (based on characters created by)
Actors: Chris Pine, Keira Knightley, Kevin Costner, Kenneth Branagh
tomatoConsensus: It doesn't reinvent the action-thriller wheel, but Jack Ryan: Shadow Recruit offers a sleek, reasonably diverting reboot for a long-dormant franchise.
